name: v0.10.3
body:
## What's Changed
* chore(deps-dev): bump pytest from 7.1.1 to 7.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/117
* chore(deps-dev): bump pre-commit from 2.18.1 to 2.19.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/124
* limit and order on foreign tables by @tbrains in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/120
* chore(deps): bump pydantic from 1.9.0 to 1.9.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/126
* chore(deps): bump httpx from 0.22.0 to 0.23.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/127
* chore(deps): bump furo from 2022.4.7 to 2022.6.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/130
* chore(deps): bump furo from 2022.6.4.1 to 2022.9.15 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/152
* chore(deps-dev): bump pre-commit from 2.19.0 to 2.20.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/138
* chore(deps-dev): bump python-semantic-release from 7.28.1 to 7.32.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/154
* chore(deps-dev): bump black from 22.3.0 to 22.10.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/155
* chore(deps-dev): bump pytest-cov from 3.0.0 to 4.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/156
* chore(deps-dev): bump pytest from 7.1.2 to 7.1.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/158
* chore(deps): bump pydantic from 1.9.1 to 1.10.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/159
* chore(deps-dev): bump flake8 from 4.0.1 to 5.0.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/157
* fix: bumps Postgrest version by @J0 in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/160

## New Contributors
* @tbrains made their first contribution in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/120

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/compare/v0.10.2...v0.10.3

name: v0.7.0
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: params and headers of session are shared between queries by @leynier in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/55
* fix: query params are immutable when using order by @leynier in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/57
* feat: add return mode like a parameter by @leynier in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/59
* feat: non str arguments to filters by @leynier in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/58
* chore: bump version to v0.7.0 by @leynier in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/60


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/compare/v0.6.0...v0.7.0

name: v0.6.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add Match Command by @J0 in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/18
* Add Code of Conduct and Contributing guide by @J0 in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/23
* fix bug on sanitizing params by @bariqhibat in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/24
* Implement counting feature by @lqmanh in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/26
* Add docker-compose setup for local development by @sureshdsk in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/22
* Add pre-commit by @anand2312 in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/28
* Bump mypy from 0.902 to 0.910 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/12
* Bump httpx from 0.19.0 to 0.20.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/31
* Bump pytest-asyncio from 0.15.1 to 0.16.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/32
* Bump pytest from 6.2.4 to 6.2.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/15
* Bump pytest-cov from 2.12.1 to 3.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/34
* Bump black from 21.7b0 to 21.10b0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/33
* feat: implement async sync with `unasync-cli` by @leynier in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/30
* fix: interpolations errors and other things reported by sourcery-ai by @leynier in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/37
* Add Sourcery to pre-commit by @lqmanh in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/38
* Revert "Add Sourcery to pre-commit" by @lqmanh in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/41
* Bump httpx from 0.20.0 to 0.21.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/44
* Bump pre-commit from 2.15.0 to 2.16.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/45
* Bump black from 21.10b0 to 21.11b1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/46
* perf: use inheritance to improve our code base by @leynier in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/47
* Update Postgrest version  by @J0 in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/50
* Bump mypy from 0.910 to 0.930 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/52
* Bump black from 21.11b1 to 21.12b0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/51

## New Contributors
* @J0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/18
* @bariqhibat made their first contribution in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/24
* @sureshdsk made their first contribution in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/22
* @anand2312 made their first contribution in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/28
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/12
* @leynier made their first contribution in https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/pull/30

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/supabase-community/postgrest-py/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0
